Uh, budget discrepancies are WAY more viable to beat in modern than standard.

I had a WB warriors deck in standard that was fun as F but had no chance to win against sultai or abzan. The kicker is that for what, 20 more bucks, I could have had a 8rack or budget modern deck that's way better.
Yup
